cause.description:
Jonah is a 2-year old brilliant child and music lover. He loves to smile and say, "what you talkin' Bout Daddy??! all the time. He likes to pt his underwear on himself and often times they are backwards. He has a keen sense of humor and loves Choo choo trains. All proceeds actually raised for his college fund will be given to Voice of the Martyrs.
1. Jonah is Brilliant
2. He will need a good job
3. People are still dying for the Cause of Christ
cause.name: Jonah Z. College Fund
